alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 5:24PM EDT until April 17 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marianna, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marianna, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Blue Spring, Lovedale, Dellwood, Star, Two Egg, Cypress, Chipola Terrace, Buena Vista and Marianna Municipal A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
